response:
Can someone post a program template for submitting a solution in Java in Codeforces programming competitions?: :Yes I want to start programming competitions so I dont know how to submit in Java?Answers very apreciatedbye
I'm not sure what you mean by "submit in Java". Do you mean how to write a program in Java? Or do you mean how to submit a program to Codeforces?
If you mean how to write a program in Java, then you can use any IDE that supports Java, such as Eclipse, IntelliJ, NetBeans, etc.
If you mean how to submit a program to Codeforces, then you can use the Java API provided by Codeforces. You can find the documentation for the Java API here: https://codeforces.com/api/java/
You can also find some examples of how to use the Java API here: https://codeforces.com/api/java/examples/
If you have any specific questions about how to use the Java API, you can ask them here on the Codeforces forum.
